website_summaries.verdict: MSI's 34-inch ultrawide Optix MPG341CQR combines solid gaming performance with a raft of exclusive features, adding up to an ultra-quick curved panel that excels across nearly every metric that matters to gamers.
pros: Innovative design and wide gamer feature set
cons: Overall HDR and movie quality is so-so
Contrast ratio tested lower than advertised
Built-in webcam is nifty but works only for facial recognition feature

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for 1080p 144hz gaming
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this MSI product to those who are seeking a 144hz 1080p monitor. I am just amazed at how a 27 inch monitor makes such a difference from a 24 inch, also the 144hz refresh rate makes things extremely smooth and the curve allows me to see everything easier. The headphone slot at the side of the monitor is also handy to keep the desk clean. Only thing I would be a bit critical of though is that the stand does stick out a bit too much for my liking. Other than that it is an excellent product by MSI.
customer_reviews.author: Kieren Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the heavily discounted price I got it for...
customer_reviews.text: Returned after using for less than 1 hour. Every feature and marketing information relating to this monitor is a gimmick. Picture quality was awful, colour, brightness and sharpness were on par with cheapest monitor's I've used. Pixels were flickering, as though they were unable to be fired all at once. Note, I have a gtx1080 and tried this on another machine and at different resolutions. There was definitely a reason why I got it for the price it was sold. It's all a gimmick. Not worth a purchase. Not worth the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Alexander J. Oram

customer_reviews.title: Excessive BLB
customer_reviews.text: This was my first curved monitor. One's brain easily adapts to the new shape. I liked the design, features and refresh rate, Freesync worked flawlessly with G-Sync. Unfortunately I had to return it for excessive backlight bleed. I'm not buying another one like this. It looks like manufacturing process of curved monitors is not yet perfected as the backlight uniformity seems to be affected by mechanical stress put on LCD panel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice screen but makes my eyes hurt
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why but my eyes hurt when using this screen. Not sure if it is the size of it or something else but i have changed a bunch of different settings but still there is something about it which isnt too great. I would not recommend. Update: This has only gotten worse as time went on so I attempted to get a refund and send this back as a monitor should not do this and I have never experienced this before. AO will not refund you all of your money only 70% of it so I would stay away from this product and from this company in the event that you are provided with a faulty/unsatisfactory product.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixels
customer_reviews.text: I requested a replacement of this monitor and this time it came with few dead pixels! Huge disappointment from MSI and Amazon! BUY AT YOUR OWN RISK! Value your money!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Ivanov

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Exeptional colors...the only downside is that u need good graphics card
customer_reviews.author: Konstantinos Kasiotis

customer_reviews.title: Read it might help u out
customer_reviews.text: Just got this monitor and a bit upset tbh the rgb light can't be one colour or can't even be changed for that matter playing fortnight on a xbox one s one 120 hrz the game is very hard on the eyes and it ever hard to notice far away objects change all the setting in the monitor and in the xbox and still no change but still worth the money as video editing look good I would say it worth the money but if It went down another 50 pound I would buy other 2 but not for 200 pound there other gaining monitor that are better the this tbh
customer_reviews.author: NIPPLE95

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice aspect.
customer_reviews.text: My son is using it for his playstation, the first couple of days he wasn't sure if he liked it because he said it was to big and curvy and he wasn't used with that kind of monitor, but now he's got used with it and he really likes everything about it .He said it is a good quality and a smart monitor, he's also watching YouTube videos and movies and he can adjust the brightness how he likes. I believe is well worth the money and definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: danna

customer_reviews.title: Blurry in games
customer_reviews.text: We bought this monitor for gaming but strait away we saw a problem compaird to our 2015 lg monitor 34" the picture quality was bad blurry we tryd every thing to fix it even toms hardware setting but no good we tryd 1070ti 1080ti x570 radion just incase but still blurry very disappointed as we was hoping for real upgrade considering the spec so sent back for refund and looking on amazon for differant 34"
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Could've been amazing, ruined by flaws
customer_reviews.text: Going from 60hz to 144hz was incredible! I just wish I picked a better monitor to experience it. The RGB mystic light was the only thing that worked flawlessly. After around a week, I experienced heavy backlight bleeding from the corners where it curves. Around two weeks later I started experiencing weird flickering lines (see photos) and eventually just returned it. Awaiting on 144hz Samsung display as a replacement. Real shame, everything else I have MSI is top quality :-(
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor I have used, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has a very nice, sleek design with thin bezels. Very immersive gaming experience due to the curved screen, crisp quality too when watching videos. Incredibly easy to install the stand and navigating the menus is just as easy with its stick control as opposed to buttons. I have no complaints of this monitor from my experience with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, the default settings are far too "sharp" and make text hard to read, but this can be tweaked and fixed. The bigger issue (in the photos) is the "crosshair" lines of pixels the monitor developed after just a few months (also present with no input connected so not the source at fault). It is now going back and I'm looking at alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Stoofer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this monitor daily for a few months now. Fantastic purchase. Mess around with the settings a little to have it display as you wish. No trouble with blur or dead pixels. Crisp quality even playing FPS games with high sensitivity. Easy to adjust the screen itself, tilts at an angle and adjusts at a height to suit any user. Worth the £200 price tag I paid for it
customer_reviews.author: Jakeh100

customer_reviews.title: Great screen
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice if it was 1440p. I noticed pixels when staring at it but honestly when you're in a game you don't notice. 1080p means you can use the higher FPS if you have a mid range CPU/GPU. Nvidias Ansel really makes the quality stand out. Looks superb.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Impressive small curved monitor. Nice colour and not too bright for long term gaming or using office. The package was such big and strong enough to protect the monitor. My friend wanted one as well after testing the monitor. No dead pixel or obvious light leakage. MSI did a great job.
customer_reviews.author: HolyDragonCasios

customer_reviews.title: This Item arrived damaged and was returned before Christmas....I am still waiting for my refund
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure it would be a great product if it wasn’t faulty
customer_reviews.author: Lil

customer_reviews.title: Bang on for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the price this moniter is spot on ,not perfect but for the money im well pleased ,plays modern warfare smothly with only very minor ghosting
customer_reviews.author: Chib1977

customer_reviews.title: Great overall 1440p monitor
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product. I do a lot of research before I buy this MSI monitor. 1440p and 27" is the best resolution for overall use. Curve on this monitor it's very nice and very fast to get use to it. After a 4 moths of everyday use, I don't have any problems, no death pixels, but for gaming on full settings you need a better GPU. Recommend for everybody who looking for great 1440p monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clear, crisp, and stylish display
customer_reviews.text: Immediate difference between this and an old 60Hz monitor. No longer having to deal with screen tears or unclear displays. Product has clear and crisp image as expected along side a sleek design. Would recommend this product to those who are after a 144Hz display for gaming. However would not yet buy this if seeking a secondary display as the price is still significantly higher than regular 60Hz monitor (which is ok for me as a secondary display).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy and can game alot better now 👍
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase, delivery was ABIT mishap but got it rescheduled, if you want a good gaming screen I recommend this product comes with everything you need even a International plug power cable is well as UK standard one! Was very impressed easy to setup👍
customer_reviews.author: anime fan

customer_reviews.title: I'm a happy camper:) can't complain to much
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with this purchase only one thing some time on the screen you start to see blue,grin hase but still not regretting the purchase
customer_reviews.author: goodman

customer_reviews.title: Great display
customer_reviews.text: Great option for a person on a budget but wants all of the features. Smooth due to the 144hz and 1ms responce time, curved display eliminates some of the colour fad from the va panel, and the 1440p is great only downsides are the va panel is not 100% colour accurate and the rgb back-light isn't the brightest and some may take it or leave it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: After a metric tonne of research I finally decided to bite the bullet on this bad boy and I haven't regretted it in the slightest. Superb picture quality, easy setup and it just looks incredible. Extremely happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kieran

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is a beast.
customer_reviews.text: Well thought out, well built, adjustable in so many ways and the preset modes to flick between if you're editing, gaming or watching films is so quick and easy. High quality. Very very very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my 2060 from Asus, runs at 144hz and 1080p as advertised and has everything I need. Height adjust and tilt are included but the stand is quite large and will protrude into your desk space if you have a smaller desk like myself. Other than that would highly recommend as a midrange monitor
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable height is brilliant, picture and everything is very good. Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: damien overton

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING GAMING MONITOR
customer_reviews.text: Hassle free purchase that arrived on time and well packaged. Awesome gaming monitor.. definitely recommended
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Monitor is very good considering how cheap it is compared to similar spec monitors. I have had little issues with the monitor, serves me well both in game and for media.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Use it mainly for dev work. It is the right size if you are replacing multiple 1080p screens and want to keep the same (albeit smaller) UI scaling. USB C supports quick charge which was a pleasant surprise. USB hub is also handy. Read mode is nice if you don't mind inaccurate colours.
customer_reviews.author: SerjTS

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Yeah its ok but its a bit washed out looking, not overly impressed but for the kids its fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MONITOR FOR 4K GAMING
customer_reviews.text: The monitor turned up in great condition and has worked perfectly out of the box. Image quality is amazing. Games look good at 4k and i wont be going back to a standard monitor. The stand is well built and has full adjustment. It actually goes quite high which is nice! The build quality is spot on with the metal enclosure and metal stand base. Cant be Happier!
customer_reviews.author: James Bland

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor had no problems love the curve the quality and everything. If given the chance to buy another monitor I would buy the same monitor again as my second monitor! The one thing which I didn't like was the lights at the back they seem really pointless but other than that everything is perfect! 9/10
customer_reviews.author: Zaib

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic screen
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! For this price you so okay won’t get better. This competes with some much more expensive screens, of which I’ve had a few) I feel like I owe MSI some money after this steal. So I bought the MSI 2080ti duke to go with it. Enjoy my money MSI, you deserve it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: ghosting when on fastest respons time
customer_reviews.text: Horrible ghosting when on fastest response time and the OSD is horible, not many settings to chose from.. also I cand find settings for freesync so you don t enev know if is working or not
customer_reviews.author: DownYo

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Got this a couple of months ago, seems legit only issue is that weird popping noise almost sounds like it might blow up :O but apart from that it's well worth the price and runs at 115hz if you overclock it.
customer_reviews.author: pileage

customer_reviews.title: Great value 1440p gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic price for a 1440p 144hz monitor as they are often £500 or more. The picture quality is excellent and a big step up from a 1080p monitor. Low input lag and freesync makes it great for gaming. The build quality is very good with thin bezels and the stand doesn't take up too much desk space.
customer_reviews.author: Mr J Evans

customer_reviews.title: one of the best 24' 1080 144hz monitors
customer_reviews.text: do you like a 24 inch monitor and want a display rate of 144hz that feels premium but isn't overpriced? Get this model.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cl

customer_reviews.title: Great 1440p 144hz experience.
customer_reviews.text: A great monitor for gaming. would recommend for people who have a GPU powerful enough to run games at this resolution and frame rate. Otherwise your paying too much for something you wont truly enjoy or experience. The curve is great and it is good for many different viewing angles.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gaming
customer_reviews.text: I loved it since it came , I’ve been using it for few days now and it’s amazing , the contrast in the colours and the settings for the gaming are amazing
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Awesome monitor
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a good curved monitor for a while but didn’t really want to break the bank, so when I saw this I ordered it straight away and it is pretty damn great, picture is great, frame rate is awesome, and the curvature makes it really immersive
customer_reviews.author: twm lewis

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixel
customer_reviews.text: Product is amazing, unfortunatly i seem to have a dead pixel on mine
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: This gaming monitor is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gaming 144hzts monitor a couple months ago and it is really easy to setup and it is amazing, i recommend. This is brilliant for gaming
customer_reviews.author: Jason Manson

customer_reviews.title: decent monitor
customer_reviews.text: The colors are good after a bit a tweaking. The preselescted modes are not as you expect but overall is a good monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refresh + display
customer_reviews.text: Love it, to get 144hz go to settings in windows, then display, then choose advanced options and choose the monitor and select 144hz. Recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: HypeR

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Item, refund was slow
customer_reviews.text: Item was faulty , took a long time to receive refund from this supplier
customer_reviews.author: marie hunt

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Product seems very good in the last week or so. No issues with any games, and the picture seems very good overall.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is excellent for gaming, and at the price I cannot complain.
customer_reviews.author: Jarjar

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: terrible colour banding, have returned for refund. Expected better for the price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Been using the monitor for a week now and have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking monitor great for 1080p 144hz gaming hasn’t let me down yet, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle J.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic!!! Very very good! If you are not sure which one you want, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: mithrandir2010

customer_reviews.title: Performance of the Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and there’s different types of features that you can change it too
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Angel Tan

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: My first ever monitor, and it is amazing. VA panel too and looks great. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixel but all in all a good monitor
customer_reviews.text: Good monitor for the price, but sadly came with 2 dead pixels not that annoying, so didn't return it
customer_reviews.author: Jonas law

customer_reviews.title: Good value !
customer_reviews.text: Nice screen. Good value and apreciated the early arrive and the free headset!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Razvan mare

product_meta.title: MSI Optix MPG341CQR Curved Gaming Monitor 34 Inch, UWQHD, VA, 144 Hz, 1 ms, 3440 x 1440, 1440p, 1800R, RGB Mystic Light, DisplayPort, 2x HDMI, Type-C, AMD FreeSync
product_meta.description: Size Name:34 Inch, 3440 x 1440, 144Hz, Curved UWQHDSee Clear in the Dark Get the jump on enemies before they even notice you. The Night Vision is built to be easy on the eyes. You're not afraid of the dark, are you? Smart RGB Wondering how the weather will be? The MSI Optic MPG341CQR with its Smart RGB LEDs can be set up to show information such as weather through visual colours and animations. Unlock the Full Potential The MSI Optic MPG341CQR has a built in smart webcam that provides facial recognition which can change colour profiles based on the user it detects.
feature_bullets: Curved gaming display (1800R) – The best gameplay immersion
Uwqhd high resolution - game titles will even look better, displaying more details due to the UWQHD resolution
Game sense - Conductively enables external game alerts via RGB LED lighting with the hottest competitive online games
144Hz refresh rate – The real smooth gaming
1ms Response time - eliminate screen tearing and choppy frame rates

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars628 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
